amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being available for the Houston Zoo in Houston, Texas.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to limit the use of funds for the Houston Zoo, in Houston, Texas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 77 - 347 (Roll no. 702).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Flake.
